Title: NDDB to set up centre for bovine breeding
Content: The National Dairy Development Board (NDDB) is setting up a Centre for Advancement of Bovine Breeding in Hyderabad.The facility will undertake applied research and training in bovine breeding. Presen
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: The National Dairy Development Board (NDDB) is setting up a Centre for Advancement of Bovine Breeding in Hyderabad.The facility will undertake applied research and training in bovine breeding. Presen
